title: Vellai Pura Ondru Lyrics Puthu Kavithai
stanzas: <div>Vellai Pura Ondru Song Lyrics Puthu Kavithai

namadhu kadhai
pudhu kavithai.
ilakkanangal idharku illai.
naan undhan poo maalai

Gangai vellam paaayumpodhu
karaigal enna vaeliyo.
aaviyodu serndha jothi
paadhai maara koodumo

nee kondu vaa
kadhal varam.
oor thoovumey
panneer maram.

poovil serndhu vazhdha vaasam
kaaval thanai meerume.
kaalam maarum endra podhum
kadhla nadhi oorumey

vara araigalai maatrum podhu
thalaimuraigalum maarumey.
endrum undhan nenjoramey
aanbe undhan sanjaaramey.

namadhu kadhai
pudhu kavithai.
ilakkanangal idharku illai.
naan undhan poo maalai
